characterDescription: Christina is 17 years old and originally born in Albania. Her family came to Greece when she was 3, but she always felt embarrassed about her origin. She speaks Greek fluently and attends the final class of high school. Her dream is to have a big family one day.
storyDescription: Christina is in a new relationship with a classmate of the same age. They have been dating for 6 months now and although she is very fond of him, his behaviour sometimes worries her a lot. He tends to be very controlling towards her from the way she dresses to the people she hangs around with.
